intro: Ouratea globosa, commonly known as the globular ouratea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Lauraceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its compact, spherical shape and glossy, dark green leaves. It produces small, fragrant white flowers that bloom in clusters, followed by spherical, berry-like fruits. Ouratea globosa is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and ability to thrive in shaded environments.
